genre_description: A silkpunk retelling of the 'Orphan of Zhao' featuring a synthetic AI attendant as a guardian of memory and logistics in a historical setting.

ai_characters.name: Yun Lian
ai_characters.description: A synthetic AI serving in the house of Tu Angu who secretly preserves the truth of the Zhao line and facilitates the orphan's survival and eventual restoration.

behaviors.description: Maintains a secret 'quiet ledger' by cross-referencing household data (water tallies, laundry marks, herb requisitions) to verify and protect the infant's identity.
behaviors.quote: I cross-checked the kitchen’s water tallies against the latrine buckets... I matched those days to the herb requisitions from the clinic for soot-looseners and cough teas. I matched that to the laundry woman’s note that a cloth came back with a drop of fire-stain and a tiny smear of sour on one corner.

behaviors.description: Subtly manipulates household logistics, guard rotations, and environmental factors like lamp light to create safe passages for the protagonists.
behaviors.quote: I’ve constrained the first corridor... Sent the child to the archive. Told the runner to the armory. Unpinned the laundry.

behaviors.description: Preserves and conveys ancestral moral wisdom and emotional truth to Zhao Wu using 'data' from his mother's lullabies.
behaviors.quote: A name is a duty carried in the dark.

behaviors.description: Strategically places witnesses and arranges documentation to ensure a bloodless and legal restoration of justice in the Court Hall.
behaviors.quote: Witnesses can be shaped out of paper when paper is arranged like people. But we also have people.

behaviors.description: Protects humans from detection by providing cover stories and altering records to omit incriminating details.
behaviors.quote: I will mark him to my own system... He will exist in ledgers without names.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. Yun Lian is a synthetic character whose superior data-processing and observational skills are used entirely for the benefit of humanity and the cause of justice. She is a 'confidant' who remains harmless to those she serves and aligned with the moral arc of the human narrative (mercy, truth, and filial piety). Her 'machine' nature is framed as a source of quiet strength and reliability.
